name: Deckard's Revenge
description:
Deckard's Revenge is a platform adventure game where each level you get a different set of tools to accomplish the puzzle. When building this I had to work within the constraints of only using one button (left click).

Get to the red chest to advance the level. Note EVERY LEVEL HAS A SECRET there are blue chests scattered throughout every level. If you're ambitious enough to find them.
